articles.title: Plane stops takeoff at Logan Airport after shooting flames, smoke
articles.description:
A plane stopped its takeoff at Boston Logan Airport Tuesday evening after flames and smoke spurted from the back of the aircraft, a video captured by Boston25 News shows.

The post Plane stops takeoff at Logan Airport after shooting flames, smoke appeared first on Boston.com.
